    • Method Detail

      • joinService

        void joinService(Service service)
        ONLY FOR SERVICES Joins current event manager. This method can only be called from inside a service. It registers for all of the events. It looks for the @Listen annotation to register for the current service. This is usually called in queueInit. EVENTS COME IN ON THE SAME QUEUE AS THE METHOD CALLS (or another queue managed by the same thread depending on the implementation).

      • joinServices

        default void joinServices(Service... services)

      • leave

        void leave()
        Opposite of join. ONLY FOR SERVICES.

      • listen

        void listen(java.lang.Object listener)
        This method can be called outside of a service. It looks for the @Listen annotation to register for certain events.

      • stopListening

        void stopListening(java.lang.Object listener)
        Opposite of register.

      • register

        <T> void register(java.lang.String channelName,
                  EventListener<T> listener)
        This method can only be called outside of a service.
        Parameters:
        channelName - array of channel names

      • unregister

        <T> void unregister(java.lang.String channelName,
                    EventListener<T> listener)
        This method can only be called outside of a service.
        Parameters:
        channelName - array of channel names

      • subscribe

        <T> void subscribe(java.lang.String channelName,
                   SendQueue<Event<java.lang.Object>> event)
        This method can only be called outside of a service. Registers an output queue to a list of channel names.
        Parameters:
        channelName - array of channel names

      • consume

        <T> void consume(java.lang.String channelName,
                 SendQueue<Event<java.lang.Object>> event)
        This method can only be called outside of a service. Registers an output queue to a consume for P2P style messaging.
        Parameters:
        channelName - array of channel names
